attributes.action: Her Majesty's Government should reconsider whether it is still appropriate for Prince William to visit China in early 2015
attributes.additional_details:
In recent weeks two groups of MPs have had their visit to China cancelled by the Chinese authorities mainly due to the recent parliamentary debates over Hong Kong.

With the Chinese saying "You are not welcomed", under the current circumstances Her Majesty's Government needs to re-assess whether the visit by His Royal Highness would undermine the dignity of the Government when the Government and MPs are trying hard to uphold Britain's obligations to the Joint Declaration.
